tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Mission
programme.desc: A spotter on the ground calls for an airstrike as he has identified 15 heavily armed suspected Al Qaeda members on horseback. JAG won’t approve the airstrike until the spotter is absolutely certain the men are Al Qaeda members.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Risky Business
programme.desc: Team Scorpion enlists the help of a musician who created a controversial algorithm that generates hit songs to help find the murderer of a music blogger.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette & Karl investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Yvette takes Karl, Stuart and Mary into the vast Shrewsbury Prison. A place riddled with paranormal activity of every kind.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette & Mary enter the vast expanse of the very haunted A-Wing on their own and soon start to regret their decision.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Uninvited Guests
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been asked to help the 1875 Inn in Tilton, New Hampshire. The Inn has had two major fires, one of which supposedly took the life of a child named Laura, who now haunts the hotel.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.sub-title: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Scott Township, Pennsylvania to investigate the Pennsylvania Asylum and Testing Lab.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantoms of the Opera
programme.desc: On this special Halloween episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio to investigate the Cincinnati Music Hall, a buildingwhere the hauntingsare as frequent as the performances.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Last Will and Evidence
programme.desc: A bride-to-be has found her dream wedding venue....Burn Brae Mansion in Gley Spey, New York.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Answers Given to Questions Never Asked
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.67
programme.desc: Teenager sued by cousin for drunk driving; blames cousin for letting minors drink. Woman claims sprayed with hose due to dog suspected of relieving on neighbor's lawn.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.257
programme.desc: Road rage after an argument over a man leaves former friends fighting over damages from a car accident.\t\t\t\r\nA personal assistant is accused of violent behavior after her decision to quit her job and sue her former employer.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.48
programme.desc: Man accused of punching lover, sued for allegedly stealing bill money due to gambling habit/Woman uses inheritance to aid brother, demands repayment; he alleges false arrest and refuses payment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.101
programme.desc: Former best friends fight over utility bills, protective orders and alleged harassment/A man sues his child’s former best friend for the cost to haul her stuff away and for filing a restraining order.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.175
programme.desc: Man accused of cheating for 10 years alleges friend vandalized his car. Woman accused of violently kicking car while witnessing couple making out inside.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.128
programme.desc: While deployed in Iraq, a woman claims the father of her child had promised to take care of her car but damaged the vehicle instead/A fifty-dollar loan and unpaid rent land feuding ex-roommates in court.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.140
programme.desc: Older couple accuses daughter and stepson-in-law of abuse including unpaid loans and theft; young couple denies. Man denies responsibility for drunk driving accident, claims friend knew he was intoxicated.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.121
programme.desc: 12-year-old allegedly vandalizes security system/Man sues ex for damaging home and clothes during break-in attempt. She admits to the damage, claims they're even now.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.177
programme.desc: Woman's front teeth cracked when intoxicated dancer trips and knocks into her at bar. Dancer denies wrongdoing. 15-year-old accused of breaking pizzeria window denies involvement but refuses to implicate friend. Police provide different account.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.30
programme.desc: Man returns to estranged wife after girlfriend allegedly hires divorce attorney/Man sues cousin for damaging and disposing of property post-eviction from shared home.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the teams compete to create the best Italian opera-inspired dishes, with the winning team getting a shopping trip and a VIP dinner. Later, the teams provide dinner service for members of the Italian Consulate.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams roll the dice to determine the ingredients for their next team challenge, while a contestant leaves due to an injury. The cooks cater for music legends during dinner service, including Stewart Copeland and Steven Tyler.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following the departure of two contestants from the competition, those remaining are challenged to create Indian-inspired meals, with the winning team earning a day of pampering at a luxurious spa.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through tough challenges. The teams are challenged to a blind taste test. Dinner service is held in honour of a group of decorated firefighters.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Nature Calls
programme.desc: Everyone spends a weekend in Vermont to watch the leaves change. During the trip, Adam gets poison ivy on his hands, Jeff has an embarrassing experience on the inn's computer, and Liz begins to realize that her marriage is a sham.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: Taking Earth
programme.desc: The human race is thrown into chaos when an alien invasion takes place. But the aliens have arrived for a very specific reason - to find the one boy out of 7 billion people who holds the power to destroy them.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Law student Maya brings her new boyfriend home for the holidays, neglecting to tell her family that he's - well - white. Maya has one week to persuade her family that this is true love, will she be able to pull off this Christmas miracle?(n)

programme.title: Christmas For Three
programme.desc: When a successful bachelor suddenly finds himself as the guardian of a 10 year old boy, he leans on the smart and beautiful social worker for help, only to fall in love with the woman who turned his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wish
programme.desc: When Paula chose Gary over Nick, 15 years later she’d be married, with tons of debt. At Christmas, when Nick reappears, now a rich, successful art broker. A little Christmas magic and she is transported to the life with Nick.(n)

programme.title: Her Son’s Secret
programme.desc: Sarah has never given up. Having lost her son Matt 13 years ago – presumed drowned and the body never recovered -- she still keeps her hopes up. One day, Matt shows up at Sarah’s door.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Dead
programme.desc: An international crime novelist is the primary suspect in the disappearance of a young woman and it's up to Detective Mary Anne Cooper to piece together this bizarre missing person's case.(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.(n)

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Armed with only his good looks and special charm, an art dealer (Johnny Depp) travels the world to find a stolen painting that is rumored to contain the code to a bank account filled with Nazi gold.(n)

programme.title: Get Smart Again
programme.desc: Maxwell Smart, Agent 99 and their CONTROL colleagues reunite to thwart a KAOS plan to achieve world domination.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Thar She Blows
programme.desc: An inventor without enough animals to drive his wagon decides to build a sail to do the job.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Measure of a Man
programme.desc: A retiring Arizona ranger chases one last crook.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: A Kingdom for a Horse
programme.desc: The Emperor of Brazil has an encounter with two imaginative youngsters while traveling to San Francisco.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Diamond Field Jack
programme.desc: An attorney takes the case of a famed gunman who is charged with murder.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Deadly Decision
programme.desc: A father who raised a cold-hearted killer worries his younger son may turn out the same way.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Man Who Died Twice
programme.desc: Peaceful Jack Slade changes into a vengeful gunman after he's attacked by a thief.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Holy Terror
programme.desc: Bill Franklin stumbles upon a rich gold vein and names it after his wife.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A missionary puts himself on the line to mediate a conflict between settlers and Navajo.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Three Minutes to Eternity
programme.desc: The Dalton brothers stage simultaneous robberies of two banks in Coffeyville.(n)

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth
programme.desc: The orphan boy Pinky follows the Captain on an exciting and dangerous journey across the big oceans to the kingdom of Lama Rama, hunting for a treasure and the answer to who is Pinky's father.(n)

programme.title: The Great Alaskan Race
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, widowed father Leonhard travels 700 miles across treacherous ice with only his sled dogs for company, to deliver the anti-toxin to the hospital, after a deadly diphtheria outbreak hits the small Alaskan town of Nome in 1925.(n)

programme.title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
programme.desc: When a violent earthquake rocks Southern California, hapless teenager Calvin Fuller (Thomas Ian Nicholas) finds himself careening through a hole torn in the fabric of time.(n)

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: In this heart-warming romantic comedy, an athlete and volunteer form an unexpected bond at the Olympic Games.(n)

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Depp, Paltrow, and McGregor star in this globe-trotting comedy about an unlikely team recruited to find a stolen, priceless painting.(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job. Starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman.(n)

programme.title: The Malta Story
programme.desc: A tribute to the people and defenders of the besieged island of Malta, centred on the pivotal role played by reconnaissance pilot Lt Peter Ross in World War II.(n)

programme.title: 21 Days
programme.desc: After Larry Darrent accidentally kills his lover's blackmailing husband, someone else is arrested for the crime. Larry and Wanda have just three weeks together before the trial of the innocent man.(n)

programme.title: Some Girls Do
programme.desc: Detective Bulldog Drummond investigates attempts to sabotage Britain's supersonic transport.(n)

programme.title: Personal Affair
programme.desc: In a 1950s British village woman disappears after a frank talk with the wife of a Latin teacher she loves, prompting the police to investigate the teacher amidst public rumours of assault and murder.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) finds himself on an ocean liner in 1954 as a desperate young man trying to win back the heart of his ex-wife. Also stars Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Al (Dean Stockwell) attempts to adjust his past through Sam (Scott Bakula), who has become an undercover cop in 1969.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Leap Home, Pt. I - November 25, 1969
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) realizes a leap-long wish and becomes himself in 1969, tempted to change the course of his family's future. David Newsom guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Leap Home, Pt. II - April 7, 1970
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of an American soldier in Vietnam whose field officer is Tom Beckett (David Newsom) -Sam's brother.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) is a priest in 1963 whose fellow pastor (Sandy McPeak) finds his own life in jeopardy because he knows a killer's identity. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: One Strobe Over the Line - June 15, 1965
programme.desc: In 1963, Sam (Scott Bakula) is a fashion photographer trying to prevent a model's overbearing agent (Susan Anton) from pushing her over the brink. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Heir and the Spare (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew arrest a con-man preying on older women. But the prisoner has a dark secret and a genetic link to Marcus. Meanwhile, Percy's secret parallel search for Dante begins to wear on her; we fear for the consequences to her health and judgement.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Just Politics (REDUX)
programme.desc: Rudolfo becomes suspicious of a trade minister the Trans-Utopian is transport­ing to the Manheim Asteroid Belt to clinch a deal. Rudolfo will benefit from the deal, but it may be too good to be true.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Negative Energy (REDUX)
programme.desc: Marcus believes he can convert the Trans-Utopian's hyper drive with negative energy instead of antimatter, rendering it safer, but hey will need Durenium to test it. He seeks a seller of this rare and - in some orbits - illegal, element.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: License to Fill (REDUX)
programme.desc: A vengeful bureaucrat has the Trans-Utopian crew charged for a license violation. Travis must defend himself in court, where his dubious past is revealed, placing him in grave danger.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Hyperspace I (REDUX)
programme.desc: Marcus finds an obscure Divinity Cluster scientist who may hold a key to new ways of altering our relationship with space-time. He succeeds all too well.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Hyperspace II (REDUX)
programme.desc: The Trans-Utopian's crew is trapped in separate folds of space-time with a ticking-clock to rejoin into one spacetime. Travis will meet Dante while Percy and Dante up a risky plan to extricate themselves from their respective hyperspatial traps.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)
